DOC.brief_summary: DHA previously show increase regional cerebral blood flow response tactile stimulation age monkey ; modulation cerebral blood flow human yet demonstrate . Given brain relies constant supply blood-borne metabolic substrate ( e.g . glucose , oxygen ) , increase regional cerebral blood flow may also impact cognitive function . The current study aim investigate effect two dos DHA-rich fish oil task-related cerebral hemodynamic response cognitive performance healthy adult .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Docosahexaenoic Acid ( DHA ) -Rich Fish Oil Cerebral Haemodynamics
DOC.criteria: Male/Female 1835 year Healthy No herbal supplements/prescription medication ( excl . contraceptive pill ) Non smoker Native English speaker consumes oily fish take omega3 supplement food allergy treatment ingredient
